fields.name: Passives:
fields.value: - Pure: Until you have Killed someone, your Hand Size is 6.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Crucifix: Pick a target. If they do not win with you, deal 1 HP of Unblockable damage to them at the end of the phase (Uncertain). You will not be informed if you were successful. [3 uses, 1 CD, Unlocks D2]
- Bind: Pick a target and a card type. If they do not win with you, prevent them from playing that card type next phase (Uncertain). You will not be informed if you were successful. [2 uses, 4 CD, Unique] 
- Trinity: Make a card in your Hand (Upgraded), (Reforged), and (Satcheled). It cannot be traded. [1 use, Unique, Unlocks D3]
